# Jaanam Samjha Karo Hindi Movie Free Download 720p: How to Watch Online
 
Jaanam Samjha Karo is a 1999 romantic comedy film starring Salman Khan, Urmila Matondkar, and Shammi Kapoor. The film was directed by Andaleeb Sultanpuri and produced by Bubby Kent. The film was a moderate success at the box office and received mixed reviews from critics.

## What is Jaanam Samjha Karo about?
 
Jaanam Samjha Karo is a story of love, misunderstanding, and family. Salman Khan plays Rahul, a singer who falls in love with Chandni (Urmila Matondkar), a dancer who works in a nightclub. Chandni lives with her three uncles (Shammi Kapoor, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, and Shakti Kapoor) who are very protective of her. Rahul tries to impress Chandni's uncles by pretending to be a rich businessman, but his lies soon create a lot of trouble for him and Chandni.
 
The film has some hilarious scenes and songs that will make you laugh and enjoy. The film also has a message of respecting women and their choices.
